meanings.definition: Not restricted or limited in any way.
meanings.sent1: She showed unreserved joy when she saw her birthday present.
meanings.sent2: The unreserved playground allowed children to play freely.
meanings.sent3: His unreserved excitement for the ice cream truck was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The unreserved laughter filled the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The unreserved kindness of the stranger left a lasting impression.

meanings.sent1: He agreed unreserved to help his friend move the furniture.
meanings.sent2: She spoke unreserved about her feelings during the therapy session.
meanings.sent3: The magician performed his tricks unreserved, leaving the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The singer's voice soared unreserved, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The chef seasoned the dish unreserved, creating a burst of flavors.

meanings.definition: Not held back or kept in reserve.
meanings.sent1: The unreserved seats at the concert were quickly taken by eager fans.
meanings.sent2: The unreserved enthusiasm of the team boosted morale during the game.
meanings.sent3: The unreserved supply of snacks at the party was a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her unreserved support for the project helped it succeed.
meanings.sent5: The unreserved energy of the puppy brought joy to the household.
